summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3949 for the improvement of West Dravus Street, from 38th Avenue West to 41st Avenue West; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 48143, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
